divs: Sighting Detailsworking as a security officer of the night fri. aug. 10 2012 in the grove park shopping plaza lakeland fla. the 1500 block of bartow road 33801 about 9:18 pm, walk the parking lot's I look up to the sky a saw a orange glowing object at a NE moving to the N at first i thought was a aircraft, 5 min. later a man who just pull up to me in auto said me there are meteor's in the shy, we look up i saw the same orange object N moving to NW slow , while driving him and his friend text each other about this orange object, there was other people in the parking lot saw this object . to me it's was a some meteor's.
Summary: orange glowing moving from the N E TO NW
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Lakeland
There were no other sightings in Lakeland on or around August 10th 2012
